Package DBAccess

Class AppointmentsDAO

java.lang.Object
DBAccess.AppointmentsDAO
public abstract class AppointmentsDAO extends Object
This class has all of the SQL commands used by the app for accessing and making any changes to the database for appointments.

    • insertAppointment

      public static int insertAppointment(int userId, String title, String description, String location, int contactId, String type, Timestamp start, Timestamp end, int customerId) throws SQLException
      Method that utilizes SQL commands to insert appointment into Appointments object to be displayed on MainAppointment Screen.
      Parameters:
      userId - The user ID for the appointment.
      title - The title for the appointment.
      description - The description of the appointment.
      location - The location of the appointment.
      contactId - The contact ID to be used for the appointment.
      type - The type of appointment.
      start - The start (timestamp) of the appointment.
      end - The end (timestamp) of the appointment.
      customerId - The customer ID for the appointment.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • updateAppointment

      public static int updateAppointment(String title, String description, String location, String type, Timestamp start, Timestamp end, int customerId, int userId, int contactId, int appointmentId) throws SQLException
      Method that utilizes SQL commands to update appointment in the Appointments table of the database.
      Parameters:
      customerId - The customer ID for the appointment.
      end - The end (timestamp) of the appointment.
      start - The start (timestamp) of the appointment.
      type - The type of appointment.
      contactId - The contact ID to be used for the appointment.
      location - The location of the appointment.
      description - The description of the appointment.
      appointmentId - The appointment ID of the appointment.
      title - The title of the appointment.
      userId - The user ID of the appointment.
      Returns:
      Returns the row of newly updated data in the MySQL database.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • deleteAppointment

      public static int deleteAppointment(int appointmentId) throws SQLException
      This method uses SQL code to delete selected appointments from the database within the app.
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - Appointment ID of the appointment where the deletion will occur.
      Returns:
      Returns the SQL data after deleting the row.
      Throws:
      SQLException
